title: upgrade to 4.5.2 killed syncing - propfind not allowed?
body:
hi,

i just upgraded from a working 4.0.7 to 4.5.2 (i'm running debian squeeze with apache).
after getting through the problem listed in  issue #367, i now find that i cannot sync with any of the clients that previously worked either.

i have tried syncing with ios (calendar and contacts), android (carddav sync free), thunderbird and even the owncloud app (android) i purchased from the play store.

none worked. i see in the apache logs that they all give the same propfind 405 error (notice that the owncloud android app is able to login and gets a 200 response; it just doesn't get any further).

so can anyone help on figuring out what broke with the upgrade and/or my configuration?

thanks

logs

owncloud android app:

xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - myuser [18/nov/2012:20:53:06 +0000] "head /remote.php/webdav http/1.1" 200 513 "-" "android-owncloud"
xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - myuser  [18/nov/2012:20:53:10 +0000] "get /status.php http/1.1" 200 636 "-" "android-owncloud"
xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx- - [18/nov/2012:20:53:10 +0000] "propfind /remote.php/webdav/ http/1.1" 405 495 "-" "android-owncloud"

carddav sync app (android):

xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - - [18/nov/2012:20:49:38 +0000] "propfind / http/1.1" 405 693 "-" "carddav-sync (android) (like ios/5.0.1 (9a405) dataaccessd/1.0) gzip"
xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - - [18/nov/2012:20:49:38 +0000] "propfind /remote.php/carddav/ http/1.1" 405 701 "-" "carddav-sync (android) (like ios/5.0.1 (9a405) dataaccessd/1.0) gzip"

mozilla thunderbird:

xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - - [18/nov/2012:20:31:59 +0000] "options /remote.php/caldav/calendars/myuser/ http/1.1" 200 277 "-" "mozilla/5.0 (windows nt 6.1; rv:16.0) gecko/20121026 thunderbird/16.0.2 lightning/1.8"
xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - - [18/nov/2012:20:31:59 +0000] "propfind /remote.php/caldav/calendars/myuser/cloud/ http/1.1" 405 628 "-" "mozilla/5.0 (windows nt 6.1; rv:16.0) gecko/20121026 thunderbird/16.0.2 lightning/1.8"

ios:

xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - - [18/nov/2012:20:37:30 +0000] "propfind /remote.php/carddav/principals/myuser/ http/1.1" 405 3540 "-" "ios/5.1.1 (9b206) dataaccessd/1.0"
xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx - - [18/nov/2012:20:37:30 +0000] "propfind /remote.php/carddav/addressbooks/myuser/default/ http/1.1" 405 628 "-" "ios/5.1.1 (9b206) dataaccessd/1.0"
